title: Define User Interface Requirements
description: Develop a list of user interface requirements for the WorkLifeHarmonyCoach application, including features, functionalities, and design elements.

title: Design the User Interface
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the user interface of WorkLifeHarmonyCoach based on the defined requirements.

title: Develop AI Scheduling Algorithm
description: Create an algorithm that can analyze user's work and personal schedules to suggest optimal schedules for better work-life balance.

title: Develop Habit Formation Module
description: Create a module that helps users form and maintain good habits to improve their work-life balance.

title: Integrate User Interface with AI Modules
description: Connect the user interface with the AI scheduling and habit formation modules to create a seamless user experience.

title: Perform Unit Testing
description: Test each component of WorkLifeHarmonyCoach to ensure they function correctly and don't introduce any errors or bugs.
dependencies: Integrate User Interface with AI Modules

title: Perform System Integration Testing
description: Test the overall functionality of WorkLifeHarmonyCoach, including all its components and how they interact with each other.
